description: Smallest positive m such that n^m has at least n digits.
maple: f := []: for i from 1 to 50 do for j from 1 do if length(i^j) >= i then f := [op(f),j]; break fi; od; od; op(f);
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 06 2001
extensions: Corrected and extended by Asher Natan Auel (auela(AT)reed.edu), May 14, 2001
